snippet.title: Northwind - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1476400/Northwind/
Website: https://northwindgame.com/

Northwind is a challenging rogue-lite deckbuilding. Hunt ferocious monsters, build your village, upgrade new tools, encounter stronger foes, and repeat!

Play as one of the two renowned mercenaries set in an ice-cold universe. Take on quests, slay ferocious monsters, build your village, and unlock new tools. With ever-changing expeditions, discover new cards, foes, and relics every time you embark.

#steam #indieworld #indiegame #indiedev #trailer #roguelite #roguelike #deckbuilding #northwind
